title: Task 19

question.text: What does the expression against the clock mean?

answers.feedback: It implies having no time limit, which is not the same as the expression.
It means having plenty of time, while the expression suggests a lack of time.
It means working in a relaxed or unhurried manner, which is the opposite of the expression.

description: The expression against the clock suggests being in a situation where time is limited, and one needs to complete tasks quickly.
